content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, I find the potential rental highly profitable. However, considering your visit and interest in the apartment, let me start with a slightly higher price than I initially planned, say 1250 Euros per month. Max, if you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of [1250] Euro! If not, please let me know your proposed figure so we can continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial proposal, but as a responsible and smart individual, I must consider my budget carefully. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I need to evaluate other options as well, Mr. Schmidt.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Max Müller. Although I'd prefer to finalize the agreement today, I do respect your need to explore other possibilities. TERMINATE (This ends the negotiation as mutually agreed price wasn't found.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
